description.zh-cn: 中国车辆传动专家，中国工程院院士，中国科学技术协会常务委员，现任大连理工大学党委书记。
description.en: A Chinese expert in vehicle transmission, an academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, a standing committee member of the China Association for Science and Technology, and the current Party Secretary of Dalian University of Technology.

description.zh-cn: 项昌乐的出生地，隶属于安徽省六安市。
description.en: The birthplace of Xiang Changle, a county under the jurisdiction of Lu'an City, Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国工程科学技术界的最高荣誉性、咨询性学术机构。
description.en: The highest honorary and consultative academic institution in the field of engineering and technology in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国科学技术工作者的群众组织，是中华人民共和国科学技术界的人民团体。
description.en: A mass organization for scientific and technological workers in China, and a people's organization in the scientific and technological community of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国辽宁省大连市的一所公立大学，是中华人民共和国教育部直属的全国重点大学。
description.en: A public university located in Dalian, Liaoning, China, and a national key university directly under the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 项昌乐的母校，位于安徽省霍山县。
description.en: The alma mater of Xiang Changle, located in Huoshan County, Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的公立大学，项昌乐在此获得学士、硕士和博士学位，并曾担任党委常务副书记等职务。
description.en: A public university in Beijing, China, where Xiang Changle obtained his bachelor's, master's, and doctoral degrees, and previously served as Executive Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，项昌乐的前任中国共产党大连理工大学委员会书记。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, the predecessor of Xiang Changle as the Party Secretary of the Dalian University of Technology Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党大连理工大学委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党大连理工大学委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在大连理工大学的组织。
description.en: The organization of the Communist Party of China at Dalian University of Technology.
Xiang Changle is a native of Huoshan, Anhui.

description.zh-cn: 项昌乐于1980年毕业于霍山中学。
description.en: Xiang Changle graduated from Huoshan Middle School in 1980.

description.zh-cn: 项昌乐于1983年12月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Xiang Changle joined the Communist Party of China in December 1983.

description.zh-cn: 项昌乐于1984年获得北京理工大学工学学士学位。
description.en: Xiang Changle received his Bachelor of Engineering degree from Beijing Institute of Technology in 1984.

description.zh-cn: 项昌乐于1987年获得北京理工大学工学硕士学位。
description.en: Xiang Changle received his Master of Engineering degree from Beijing Institute of Technology in 1987.

description.zh-cn: 项昌乐于2001年获得北京理工大学工学博士学位。
description.en: Xiang Changle received his Doctor of Engineering degree from Beijing Institute of Technology in 2001.

position.en: Member of the Standing Committee of the Party Committee, Vice President
Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee, Vice President
Executive Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee

relationships.target: 中国共产党大连理工大学委员会

description.zh-cn: 项昌乐自2021年10月起担任中国共产党大连理工大学委员会书记。
description.en: Xiang Changle has served as the Secretary of the Dalian University of Technology Committee of the Communist Party of China since October 2021.

description.zh-cn: 项昌乐接替王寒松担任中国共产党大连理工大学委员会书记职务。
description.en: Xiang Changle succeeded Wang Hansong as the Secretary of the Dalian University of Technology Committee of the Communist Party of China.
